body_html:
Please try downloading a nightly build, uninstalling TF and installing with it.
If you want to run with GPU support uninstall the CPU version and to toggle between CPU/GPU use:

with tf.Session() as sess:
     with tf.device("/cpu:0"):
body_text:
Please try downloading a nightly build, uninstalling TF and installing with it.
If you want to run with GPU support uninstall the CPU version and to toggle between CPU/GPU use:
with tf.Session() as sess:
     with tf.device("/cpu:0"):
body:
Please try downloading a [nightly build](http://ci.tensorflow.org/view/Nightly/job/nightly-win/112/), uninstalling TF and installing with it.
If you want to run with GPU support uninstall the CPU version and to toggle between CPU/GPU use:
```
with tf.Session() as sess:
     with tf.device("/cpu:0"):
```
